Name: Mucky Bottom
Ingredients: 22.5 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
Instructions: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. POUR coffee liqueur around top of drink - this will fall to the base of the glass and create a mucky bottom.
Review: Four very strong and distinctive flavours somehow tone each other down.
History: Created in 2003 by Simon Difford. This was formerly and more tastefully named Red Haze.
Nutrition: One serving of Mucky Bottom contains 323 calories
